summary: Career-focused professional seeking a full-time position with a background in assistant teaching, child care, disaster services, and delivery/logistics; strong organizational, communication, and leadership skills; experienced in coordinating volunteers and managing classrooms.
skills: ability to inspire and motivate others

experience.title: Assistant Teacher
experience.description: Care for children in institutional settings; communicate with parents about daily activities and behaviors; discipline and manage routines; assist with health and personal habits; observe signs of emotional or developmental problems and report to guardians; instruct children in health and personal habits; keep records; maintain a safe play environment; supervise and organize activities; perform housekeeping; read to children; teach painting, drawing, and songs; sanitize toys; support emotional and social development.

experience.title: Delivery Driver
experience.description: Drive vehicles to transport materials; inspect and maintain vehicle; load/unload; obey traffic laws; present bills and collect payments; read maps and follow directions; report mechanical problems; manage receipts; verify inventory against shipping papers.

experience.title: Before and After School Teacher
experience.description: Arrange indoor and outdoor space for creative play; attend meetings and professional development; provide basic needs; demonstrate activities; establish rules for behavior; identify and discuss emotional or health issues with supervisors, parents or guardians; maintain student records; organize activities to promote development; plan and supervise class projects and field trips; prepare materials; provide resources for exploration; read to groups; serve meals and snacks.

experience.title: Disaster Service Specialist
experience.description: Oversee disaster services for 18 counties; supervise over 100 volunteers; recruit and train volunteers for local and national disasters; serve as liaison in the Emergency Operation Center; perform administrative work and support community events.

experience.title: Preschool Teacher
experience.description: Adapt teaching methods and materials; organize space for activities; welcome new arrivals; participate in professional development; meet children's basic needs; collaborate with staff; plan and evaluate lessons; maintain records; plan and supervise class projects, field trips, and experiential activities; provide assistive devices and accessibility; teach basic skills; manage classroom materials and supplies; provide meals and supervise nutrition.

education.degree: Ph.D. in Homeland Security Policy and Coordination
Master of Arts in Homeland Security
Bachelor of Science in Liberal Studies
